plot outline: Abbas takes a contract of killing a B Grade filmmaker Sunil Tendulkar.He hires his two of his friends Nair and Lefty for the work as they all three are in need of money.Sunita pregnant wife of Tendulkar is due on 24th April which marks birthday of Sachin Tendulkar and is planning about the future.The trio follows Tendulkar to Bomb Blast night club where he goes to meet Velvet Manisha and is under pressure to send her to politician to get money for his film.
title: Tendulkar Out
plot: Abbas takes a contract of killing a B Grade filmmaker Sunil Tendulkar.He hires his two of his friends Nair and Lefty for the work as they all three are in need of money.Sunita pregnant wife of Tendulkar is due on 24th April which marks birthday of Sachin Tendulkar and is planning about the future.The trio follows Tendulkar to Bomb Blast night club where he goes to meet Velvet Manisha and is under pressure to send her to politician to get money for his film.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
